games.summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif. -- —Russell Westbrookscored 21 points and moved past Magic Johnson for seventh place on the NBA’s career assists list while leading theSacramento Kingsto a 113-107 win over theDallas Maverickson Saturday.
blurbs: 📋 Keon Ellis (SAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 21 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: -- —Anthony Blackscored a career-high 38 points,Desmond Banemade two free throws with 6.9 seconds left and theOrlando Magicovercame another huge triple-double byNikola Jokicto beat theDenver Nuggets127-126 on Saturday night. blurbs: ⬆️ Spencer Jones (DEN) played 34 min (season avg: 20). 14 pts, 6 reb, 3 ast.
📋 Tim Hardaway Jr. (DEN) made just his 4th start this season. 20 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: NEW ORLEANS -- —Devin Bookerscored 20 points, including two clutch jumpers down the stretch, and thePhoenix Sunsbeat theNew Orleans Pelicans123-114 on Saturday night for a two-game sweep of their back-to-back set. Booker led seven Suns in double figures.Dillon Brookshad 18 points,Collin Gillespiescored 17,Jordan Goodwinadded 16 and Royce O’Neale...
blurbs: ⬆️ Oso Ighodaro (PHX) played 29 min (season avg: 18). 8 pts, 10 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: ATLANTA -- —Karl-Anthony Townsscored a season-high 36 points with 16 rebounds,Jalen Brunsonhad 34 points and theNew York Knickssurvived Atlanta’s late comeback attempt to beat the slumping Hawks 128-125 on Saturday night. blurbs: 📋 Mohamed Diawara (NY) made just his 2nd start this season. 5 pts, 5 reb.

games.summary: MIAMI -- —Andrew WigginsandJaime Jaquez Jr. each scored 28 points, and theMiami Heatran away in the fourth quarter to beat theIndiana Pacers142-116 on Saturday night.
blurbs: 🆕 Johnny Furphy (IND) made his first start of the season. 21 min, 9 pts.

games.summary: CHICAGO -- —Giannis Antetokounmposcored 29 points in his return from an eight-game absence, and theMilwaukee Buckssnapped theChicago Bulls' five-game winning streak with a 112-103 victory on Saturday night. Ryan Rollinsscored 20 points andBobby Portisadded 17 points and 10 rebounds for Milwaukee, which had dropped six of eight.

HOUSTON -- —Kevin Durantscored 30 points in three quarters to lead theHouston Rocketsto an easy 117-100 win over theCleveland Cavalierson Saturday night. The Rockets scored seven straight points, with 3s fromTari Easonand Smith, to take a 16-12 lead and never trailed again.
blurbs: 📋 Tari Eason (HOU) made just his 3rd start this season. 9 pts, 6 reb.
📋 Steven Adams (HOU) made just his 5th start this season. 9 pts, 8 reb.

games.summary: MINNEAPOLIS -- —Cam Thomasscored 30 points in his return after missing 20 games with a left hamstring strain, and theBrooklyn Netsbeat theMinnesota Timberwolves123-107 on Saturday night. Anthony Edwardsled Minnesota (20-12) with 28 points, but the Timberwolves dropped back-to-back games for the third time this season.

SAN ANTONIO -- —Lauri Markkanenhad 29 points,Keyonte Georgeadded 28 points and theUtah Jazzheld on to beat San Antonio 127-114 on Saturday night, snapping the Spurs' league-high eight-game winning streak. scored 17 points andJusuf Nurkicadded 16 for the Jazz, who have won two straight after four consecutive losses.
blurbs: 📋 Brice Sensabaugh (UTAH) made just his 2nd start this season. 11 pts, 4 reb.
